chapter.title: UUIdGenerationService
chapter.para: To create new id, create 16-byte id using UUID creating algorithm. Setting can be as follows.

row.entry: To guarantee uniqueness in space, define ID address or network car MAC address as value. Division between fields is ".", and ":" for MAC address. If not defined, MAC address is randomly created in UUIdGenerationService.

listitem.para:
The following is a part of context-idgen.xml which defines UUIdGernerationService to use in IdGernerationService and the properties. Based on MAC address, UUIdGenerationService Bean creating unique id is defined.
<bean name="UUIdGenerationService" class="anyframe.core.idgen.impl.UUIdGenerationService"> <config:configuration> <address>00:00:F0:79:19:5B</address> </config:configuration> </bean>
